DINO SPRITES: 0000|0000|0000|0000 |||| 0000|0000|0000|0000 |||| 0000|0000|0000|0000 |||| 0000|0000|0000|0000 |||| 0000|0000|0000|0000 |||| 0000|0000|0000|0000
0000 = empty: 0000|0100|0101|0000 |||| 0000|0100|0101|0000 |||| 0000|0100|0101|0000 |||| 0000|0110|0101|0000 |||| 0000|0000|0000|0000 |||| 0000|0000|0000|0000
32x32	      0102|0103|0104|0000 |||| 0102|0103|0104|0000 |||| 0102|0103|0104|0000 |||| 0102|0103|0111|0000 |||| 0112|0113|0116|0117 |||| 0112|0113|0116|0117
	      0105|0106|0000|0000 |||| 0105|0107|0000|0000 |||| 0108|0109|0000|0000 |||| 0105|0106|0000|0000 |||| 0114|0115|0118|0119 |||| 0120|0121|0118|0119

DINO FRAME: 1   = idle
            2&3 = run
            4   = death
            5&6 = run while duck

BIRD SPRITE: 0122|0123|0000 |||| 0128|0129|0000
24x24	     0124|0125|0126 |||| 0130|0131|0132
	     0000|0127|0000 |||| 0000|0000|0000

BIRD FRAME: 1&2  = flying

ALL FRAMES BETWEEN 0 && 99 are still cacti and world pieces and font
